TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IRangeValueProvider

summary.span: 公開方法與屬性，以支援控制項的使用者介面自動化用戶端存取，這些控制項可以設定為某範圍內的值。

span.span: Exposes methods and properties to support UI Automation client access to controls that can be set to a value within a range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在必須支援的 UI 自動化提供者上實作控制項模式。Implemented on a UI Automation provider that must support the control pattern.

public: property bool IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 取得值，指定控制項的值是否為唯讀。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the value of a control is read-only.

value.span: 如果該值是唯讀的則為 ，如果該值可修改則為 。

span.span: if the value is read-only; if it can be modified.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示的控制項不是唯讀的這個方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that is not read-only. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property LargeChange As Double
public: property double LargeChange { double get(); };

summary.span: 取得當進行大幅變更 (例如使用 PAGE DOWN 鍵) 時，會在 屬性上加入或減去的值。

span.span: Gets the value that is added to or subtracted from the property when a large change is made, such as with the PAGE DOWN key.

value.span: 控制項支援的大幅變更值，如果控制項不支援 ，則為 null ([!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中的 )。

span.span: The large-change value supported by the control or null ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示的控制項的 5.0 大型變更值，這個方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a control that has a large change value of 5.0. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetValue(float64 value) cil managed

span.span: Sets the value of the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定的實際值取決於控制項的實作。The actual value set depends on the control implementation. 控制項可能會捨入所要求`value`啟動或關閉。The control may round the requested `value` up or down. ## Examples 下列範例顯示自訂控制項，這個方法可能實作。The following example shows one possible implementation of this method for a custom control. 自訂控制項顯示透過其基底色彩的 alpha 值範圍值。The custom control displays its range value through the alpha value of its base color. [!code-csharp[UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip#SetValue](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip/CSharp/RangeValueFragment.cs#setvalue)] [!code-vb[UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip#SetValue](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIAIRangeValueProvider_snip/visualbasic/rangevaluefragment.vb#setvalue)]

exception.span: 當 小於控制項的最小值或大於控制項的最大值。

span.span: When is less than the minimum or greater than the maximum value of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Value As Double
public: property double Value { double get(); };

span.span: Gets the value of the control.

value.span: 控制項的值，如果控制項不支援 ，則為 null (在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)] 中為 )。

span.span: The value of the control or null ( in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the control does not support .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例顯示自訂控制項，此方法的實作。The following example shows an implementation of this method for a custom control. 基於此範例的目的，自訂控制項會顯示透過其基底的色彩 alpha 設定的值。For the purposes of this sample, the custom control displays the value through the alpha setting of its base color.
